2_13bJpDYmLnZMLWy696GAxHA9mdizyZW2PK.body: "These techniques permit the CIA to bypass the encryption of WhatsApp, Signal, Telegram, Wiebo, Confide and Cloackman by hacking the "smart" phones that they run on and collecting audio and message traffic before encryption is applied." https://wikileaks.org/ciav7p1/
